  • Constructor Details

    • ExchangeCompMain

      public ExchangeCompMain()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Method to initialize the GUI. It sets everything invisible and disable except for 2 labels and text areas. It changes the GUI so the user has to initialize the exchange rate and the account balance

    • initialButtonPress

      public void initialButtonPress​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method that once the first button is pressed on the screen with the limited features it either shows everything and changes the label, or informs the user that the information is invalid and to type valid information.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event of the button being pressed

    • submitButtonPress

      public void submitButtonPress​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method that is triggered if the button on the page with all the features is pressed. Depending on which toggle button is selected it will call a method to deposit, withdraw, or close the account.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the even of the button being pressed

    • setBalance

      public void setBalance​(float balance)
      Method that sets the balance of the account, but will also update the textFields displaying the accounts balance in USD and SWD
      Parameters:
      balance -

    • getBalance

      public float getBalance()

    • getExchangeRate

      public double getExchangeRate()

    • setExchangeRate

      public void setExchangeRate​(float exchange)

    • depositMoney

      public void depositMoney​(float depositAmount)
      Method that converts depositAmount to USD from SWD and adds that amount to the accounts full balance
      Parameters:
      depositAmount - user entered float that determines how much money in SWD the user wants to deposit

    • withdrawMoney

      public void withdrawMoney​(float withdrawAmount)
      method that takes a user entered float and converts in to usd and subtracts that amount from the main balance
      Parameters:
      withdrawAmount - user entered float that decides how much the user wants to withdraw in SWD

    • swdCashOut

      public void swdCashOut​(float withdrawAmount)
      Method that figures out how much of each currency type in SWD to give to the user that equals the amount they withdrew Prints out the type of currency and the amount of each type that equal the amount withdrawn
      Parameters:
      withdrawAmount - Gives method the amount of money being withdrawn

    • usdCashOut

      public void usdCashOut()
      Method to print out the remaining money in the bank account. It finds the amount of each currency that make up the amount of money left in the account. It prints the name of the currency and the amount of each type of currency to return.
